reviews.review_msg: This class was tough and the prof has serious expectations - slackers are not appreciated - but I learned a lot and the field trips and creative projects were different from the norm. Prof. Kenny is involved in a lot of community projects and is a great resource if you love history and want to immerse yourself. Recommended for serious students.
The reason I'm still pursuing a history minor at SFU!

Utterly failed to motivate me. Her lectures and tuturials were dry, she merely read from a pre-written lecture that she has no doubt used many, many times. Wanted a full paper proposal early in the term, far before we had even learned enough course content to even think about topics. Sarcastic - sometimes amusing, other times at students' expense.
